description.value:
Some oreads born of waterless sand planets can draw upon the friction of their desert worlds to channel their elemental opposite. An oread with this trait can cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.yFhvmdW0BnMHV3Sm]{Jolting Surge} once per day with a caster level equal to their level. At 8th level, they can use this ability one additional time per day; at 16th level, they gain a third use per day.

This replaces an oreadâ€™s spell-like ability.

After adding the spell to the Spellbook tab, edit the spell's Details, changing the Spell Preparation Mode to Innate Spellcasting, and change Limited uses to x of x Day as level allows.
